item.title: Directions
item.dc:creator: school@pymor.org
item.description: The School takes place at the PC-Pool in room VWS 128. It is located on a small island between canals. The island has a very prominent blue building with large pink tubes, the so-called Rosa Röhre. One can only enter the VWS building via the blue bridge from Müller-Breslau Straße on the south side. Click here for detailed directions.

item.title: Registration Deadline Extended
item.dc:creator: school@pymor.org
item.description: Registration deadline is extended to September 12, 2023 (see the Indico page).

item.title: Registration Open
item.dc:creator: school@pymor.org
item.description:
Registration is open until August 31, 2023 (see the Indico page). There is no registration fee, but please register to participate. If you are planning to join, we highly recommend that you book accommodation early, as the Berlin marathon takes place the following weekend. The pyMOR School will be held at the CFD Department of TU Berlin.

The timetable and the content of the introductory topics will be adapted to match the participants' requirements, based on the information provided in the registration forms. Existing users and previous participants are welcome to attend again.

item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: school@pymor.org
item.description: The fifth pyMOR School will be held in Berlin from September 18-22, 2023.
